name: Find
title: This is a quick reference list of cheatsheet for linux find command, contains common options and examples.

cards.title: Intro
cards.body: This is a quick reference list of cheatsheet for linux find command, contains common options and examples.

cards.title: Usage
cards.body: %60%60%60shell%20script%0A%24%20find%20%5Bpath...%5D%20%5Boptions%5D%20%5Bexpression%5D%0A%60%60%60%0A%0AWildcard%0A%0A%60%60%60shell%20script%0A%24%20find%20.%20-name%20%22*.txt%22%0A%24%20find%20.%20-name%20%222020*.csv%22%0A%24%20find%20.%20-name%20%22json_*%22%0A%60%60%60%0A%0A%E2%80%A2%20%5BRegex%20reference%5D(%2Fregex)%20_(cheatsheets.zip)_%0A%E2%80%A2%20%5BFind%20cheatsheet%5D(https%3A%2F%2Fgist.github.com%2Fgr1ev0us%2F3a9b9d9dbdd38f6379288eb2686fc538)%20_(gist.github.com)_

cards.title: Type
cards.body:
|           |                      |
| --------- | -------------------- |
| `-type d` | Directory            |
| `-type f` | File                 |
| `-type l` | Symbolic link        |
| `-type b` | Buffered block       |
| `-type c` | Unbuffered character |
| `-type p` | Named pipe           |
| `-type s` | Socket               |

cards.title: Size
cards.body:
|           |                           |
| --------- | ------------------------- |
| `-size b` | 512-byte blocks (default) |
| `-size c` | Bytes                     |
| `-size k` | Kilobytes                 |
| `-size M` | Megabytes                 |
| `-size G` | Gigabytes                 |
| `-size T` | Terabytes _(only BSD)_    |
| `-size P` | Petabytes _(only BSD)_    |

cards.title: Size +/-
cards.body:
Find all bigger than 10MB files

```shell script
$ find / -size +10M
```

Find all smaller than 10MB files

```shell script
$ find / -size -10M
```

Find all files that are exactly 10M

```shell script
$ find / -size 10M
```

Find Size between 100MB and 1GB

```shell script
$ find / -size +100M -size -1G
```

The `+` and `-` prefixes signify greater than and less than, as usual.

cards.title: Names
cards.body: Find%20files%20using%20name%20in%20current%20directory%0A%0A%60%60%60shell%20script%0A%24%20find%20.%20-name%20tecmint.txt%0A%60%60%60%0A%0AFind%20files%20under%20home%20directory%0A%0A%60%60%60shell%20script%0A%24%20find%20%2Fhome%20-name%20tecmint.txt%0A%60%60%60%0A%0AFind%20files%20using%20name%20and%20ignoring%20case%0A%0A%60%60%60shell%20script%0A%24%20find%20%2Fhome%20-iname%20tecmint.txt%0A%60%60%60%0A%0AFind%20directories%20using%20name%0A%0A%60%60%60shell%20script%0A%24%20find%20%2F%20-type%20d%20-name%20tecmint%0A%60%60%60%0A%0AFind%20php%20files%20using%20name%0A%0A%60%60%60shell%20script%0A%24%20find%20.%20-type%20f%20-name%20tecmint.php%0A%60%60%60%0A%0AFind%20all%20php%20files%20in%20directory%0A%0A%60%60%60shell%20script%0A%24%20find%20.%20-type%20f%20-name%20%22*.php%22%0A%60%60%60

cards.title: Permissions
cards.body:
Find the files whose permissions are 777.

```shell script
$ find . -type f -perm 0777 -print
```

Find the files without permission 777.

```shell script
$ find / -type f ! -perm 777
```

Find SUID set files.

```shell script
$ find / -perm /u=s
```

Find SGID set files.

```shell script
$ find / -perm /g=s
```

Find Read Only files.

```shell script
$ find / -perm /u=r
```

Find Executable files.

```shell script
$ find / -perm /a=x
```

cards.title: Owners%20and%20Groups
cards.body: Find%20single%20file%20based%20on%20user%0A%0A%60%60%60shell%20script%0A%24%20find%20%2F%20-user%20root%20-name%20tecmint.txt%0A%60%60%60%0A%0AFind%20all%20files%20based%20on%20user%0A%0A%60%60%60shell%20script%0A%24%20find%20%2Fhome%20-user%20tecmint%0A%60%60%60%0A%0AFind%20all%20files%20based%20on%20group%0A%0A%60%60%60shell%20script%0A%24%20find%20%2Fhome%20-group%20developer%0A%60%60%60%0A%0AFind%20particular%20files%20of%20user%0A%0A%60%60%60shell%20script%0A%24%20find%20%2Fhome%20-user%20tecmint%20-iname%20%22*.txt%22%0A%60%60%60

cards.title: Multiple dirs
cards.body:
```shell script {.wrap}
$ find /opt /usr /var -name foo.scala -type f
```

Find files with multiple dirs

cards.title: Empty
cards.body:
```shell script
$ find . -type d -empty
```

Delete all empty files in a directory

```shell script
$ find . -type f -empty -delete
```

cards.title: Means
cards.body:
| Option  | Description                                                     |
| ------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `atime` | access time (last time file <yel>opened</yel>)                  |
| `mtime` | modified time (last time file <yel>contents was modified</yel>) |
| `ctime` | changed time (last time file <yel>inode was changed</yel>)      |

cards.title: Example
cards.body:
| Option          | Description                                                |
| --------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- |
| `-mtime +0`     | Modified greater than 24 hours ago                         |
| `-mtime 0`      | Modified between now and 1 day ago                         |
| `-mtime -1`     | Modified less than 1 day ago (same as `-mtime 0`)          |
| `-mtime 1`      | Modified between 24 and 48 hours ago                       |
| `-mtime +1`     | Modified more than 48 hours ago                            |
| `-mtime +1w`    | Last modified more than 1 week ago                         |
| `-atime 0`      | Last accessed between now and 24 hours ago                 |
| `-atime +0`     | Accessed more than 24 hours ago                            |
| `-atime 1`      | Accessed between 24 and 48 hours ago                       |
| `-atime +1`     | Accessed more than 48 hours ago                            |
| `-atime -1`     | Accessed less than 24 hours ago (same as `-atime 0`)       |
| `-ctime -6h30m` | File status changed within the last 6 hours and 30 minutes |

cards.title: Examples
cards.body:
Find last 50 days modified files

```shell script
$ find / -mtime 50
```

find last 50 days accessed files

```shell script
$ find / -atime 50
```

find last 50-100 days modified files

```shell script
$ find / -mtime +50 â€“mtime -100
```

find changed files in last 1 hour

```shell script
$ find / -cmin -60
```

find modified files in last 1 hour

```shell script
$ find / -mmin -60
```

find accessed files in last 1 hour

```shell script
$ find / -amin -60
```

cards.title: Find%20and%20concatenate
cards.body: Merge%20all%20csv%20files%20in%20the%20download%20directory%20into%20%60merged.csv%60%0A%0A%60%60%60shell%20script%0A%24%20find%20download%20-type%20f%20-iname%20'*.csv'%20%7C%20xargs%20cat%20%3E%20merged.csv%0A%60%60%60%0A%0AMerge%20all%20sorted%20csv%20files%20in%20the%20download%20directory%20into%20%60merged.csv%60%0A%0A%60%60%60shell%20script%20%7B.wrap%7D%0A%24%20find%20download%20-type%20f%20-iname%20'*.csv'%20%7C%20sort%20%7C%20xargs%20cat%20%3E%20merged.csv%0A%60%60%60

cards.title: Find and sort
cards.body:
Find and sort in ascending

```shell script
$ find . -type f | sort
```

find and sort descending

```shell script
$ find . -type f | sort -r
```

cards.title: Find and chmod
cards.body:
Find files and set permissions to 644.

```shell script
$ find / -type f -perm 0777 -print -exec chmod 644 {} \;
```

Find directories and set permissions to 755.

```shell script
$ find / -type d -perm 777 -print -exec chmod 755 {} \;
```

cards.title: Find%20and%20compress
cards.body: Find%20all%20%60.java%60%20files%20and%20compress%20it%20into%20%60java.tar%60%0A%0A%60%60%60shell%20script%0A%24%20find%20.%20-type%20f%20-name%20%22*.java%22%20%7C%20xargs%20tar%20cvf%20java.tar%0A%60%60%60%0A%0AFind%20all%20%60.csv%60%20files%20and%20compress%20it%20into%20%60cheatsheets.zip%60%0A%0A%60%60%60shell%20script%0A%24%20find%20.%20-type%20f%20-name%20%22*.csv%22%20%7C%20xargs%20zip%20cheatsheets.zip%0A%60%60%60
